message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. Given its features and value, I'm proposing a starting price of $20,000. I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $14,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
